EmailTemplate.description: Notify applicant of the request to withdraw and the file is closed
EmailTemplate.name: POWTS Withdraw at Submitter's Request
EmailTemplate.subject: POWTS Plan Review Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today}
{!Contact.Client_Id__c}
Contact Name
Contact Address
PLAN WITHDRAWN AT SUBMITTER'S REQUEST/FILE CLOSED
Identification Numbers
Transaction ID No.
Site ID No.
Please refer to both identification numbers, above, in all correspondence with the agency.
SITE:
FOR: {!MUSW__Permit2__c.Name}
This plan is being sent back to you at your request due to the results of the onsite visit made by the Dept. of Safety and Professional Services Wastewater Specialist, [Reviewer]. In addition the request for additional information has reach the time limit of over 30 business days with no response from you. As a result, the submittal as described above has been CLOSED, with no action taken. No refunds of fees paid to date shall be made.
One copy of the submittal will be retained in the office listed above. The balance of the submittal is being returned.
Should you desire to proceed with this project, new fees, completed application form and submittal of plans/specifications will be required.
Inquiries should be directed to me at the telephone number listed below, or at the address on this letterhead. Please refer to Transaction ID No. referred to in the regarding line when making reference to this correspondence.
Sincerely,
